!Orim of the Shadow: How could it be! This is the box which I believed to be the Cube of Aklantoth... The Cube which I trusted would contain the spirits of the ancient scholar... Was in fact a prison in which the demons were captured in ... Moreover, it is *Zeruel*the Malrukian prince, Monarch of Drevanul, the bloody angel... It is all my fault! I was too confident! I was careless! My impatience is to blame! [Quest _229_TestOfWitchcraft 30630-16.htm|"We must get control of this situation!"]
